docs.text: Introduction Welcome to the JRP.best docs! Here you will lean how to deploy to JRP.best and how to use our services.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Welcome to the JRP.best docs! Here you will lean how to deploy to JRP.best and how to use our services.
docs.title: Introduction

docs.text: API An Api for easy communication between jrp servers, and your website. Use To use this api, include it in your head element: <script src="http://api.jrp.best/minified_files/include-apis.min.js"></script> Functions GetB64File(key, filename); This function gets the requested favicon's base64 value, example: <script src="http://api.jrp.best/minified_files/include-apis.min.js"></script> <script> async function() { var favb64 = GetB64File(accesskey, 'favicon-jrp.best'); console.log(favb64); }; </script>
docs.title: Api

docs.text: An Api for easy communication between jrp servers, and your website.
docs.title: API

docs.text: To use this api, include it in your head element: <script src="http://api.jrp.best/minified_files/include-apis.min.js"></script>
docs.title: Use

docs.text: This function gets the requested favicon's base64 value, example: <script src="http://api.jrp.best/minified_files/include-apis.min.js"></script> <script> async function() { var favb64 = GetB64File(accesskey, 'favicon-jrp.best'); console.log(favb64); }; </script>
docs.title: GetB64File(key, filename);

docs.text: Deploying Before you try to deploy your site to JRP.best you MUST apply for beta, there is currently one way to do this and that is DMing Givinghawk#4893 on discord. What you need Be part of the BETA program. Have your files ready to send to us, more on this later. Options You have a few options for choosing what node you are going to be on. Web hosting Node 0, Private hosting but with the drawback of having the files take way longer to get onto the server Node 1, 2 & 3, Simple fast and on github File hosting Node 0, Quick easy private hosting with custom share links ect with automatic approval Node 1, Quick easy public hosting without custom share links and hosted on github with manual approval
docs.title: Deploying
